original_text: As for your donkeys that were lost three days ago, do not set your mind on them, for they have been found. And for whom is all that is desirable in Israel? Is it not for you and for all your father's house?”
korean_text: 사흘 전에 잃은 네 암나귀들을 염려하지 말라 찾았느니라 온 이스라엘이 사모하는 자가 누구냐 너와 네 아버지의 온 집이 아니냐 하는지라

sentences.original_text: that were lost three days ago
do not set your mind on them
And for whom is all that is desirable in Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘에서 바람직한 모든 것은 누구를 위한 것인가

sentences.original_text: and for all your father's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 아버지의 온 집을 위한 것이 아니냐
